title: What was the first video game you ever played?
body: When I was very young (can't remember exactly how young) I played Super Mario Bros 3 on the old NES. This was technically my first game. A few years later I got a SNES for my birthday with Donkey Kong, and this is what really got me into gaming. I remember I couldn't get past the snow world for some reason, and then a few years later I started playing again and finally beat the game. So what was the first game you ever played, and which game got you addicted?
